issues.shortMessage: Rename this field to not shadow the outer class' member with the same name.
issues.fullMessage: It's possible to name the members of an inner class the same as the "static" members of its enclosing class - possible, but a bad idea. That's because maintainers may be confused about which members are being used where. Instead the inner class' members should be renamed and all the references updated.
